name: Tumblr Sponsored Posts remover.
description: Annoyed much of those sponsored posts in your dashboard? Confused as to why you see a cartoon you don't even recognize or horror movies trailers in your dashboard? This will remove them all!
additional_info:
Annoyed much of those sponsored posts in your dashboard? Confused as to why you see a cartoon you don't even recognize or horror movies trailers in your dashboard? This will remove them all!

The style itself is no longer than a line, and it just selects the display status of the sponsored posts classified under one cathegory to not be displayed.
